titlealts.searchtitle: NHS Business Definition: International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics - Description

div.p: The International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics is an ORGANISATION.
The International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics (FIGO) is the only worldwide ORGANISATION that groups obstetricians and gynaecologists.
The International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics' mission is to promote the wellbeing of women and to raise the standards of practice in obstetrics and gynaecology.
For further information on the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics, see the International Federation of Gynecology and Obstetrics website.
